category-def.name: org.eclipse.efm.category
category-def.label: EFM Modeling Category
category-def.description: EFM Modeling Feature: a Papyrus/UML modeling environment to produce behavioral models for analysis with the Symbex Platform (a.k.a. DIVERSITY) EFM Modeling Textutal Feature: an advanced xText environment for writing models using the native language of the Symbex Platform (a.k.a. xLIA)
